name: Earl Grey Tea Cookies
description: These are delicious tea cookies, infused with the magic of Earl Grey!

ingredients.name: finely grated orange or lemon zest

preparation: In a food processor, pulse all dry ingredients until tea is pulverized.

Add vanilla extract, butter, sugar, orange or lemon zest, if using, and water. Pulse until a dough starts to come together. Remove the dough onto a piece of wax or parchment paper and form into a log. Wrap the paper around and roll the log smooth. Chill for at least 30 minutes or freeze for later use.
Slice the log into approximately 1⁄2’’ discs. Space 1’’ apart on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Bake until edges are slightly golden, 12–14 minutes.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
